name: Aim Bot
description:
Submission for Wowie Game Jam 4 (theme: Collaborate With AI)

Team up with a computer-controlled teammate and defeat waves of enemies! Upgrade your weapon by increasing its damage, reload speed, and magazine size or by purchasing a new, stronger weapon. But keep in mind you need to purchase upgrades for your AI team member as well!

Keep going until the onslaught becomes too much to handle and see how many enemies you and the computer defeated.
